## Title

Big Data, AI, and Building Sector Decarbonization

### Time

Monday, February 3, 2025, 6:00PM - 7:00PM ET

### Venue 

Online via Zoom. Please [register](https://forms.gle/65hnhJPmnYaz5utG9) to participate.

## About

Dr. Johnston will share his experiences to use data and model to do robust data-driven analysis and how does it could facilitate decarbonizing the building sector.


## Speaker

:::{#speaker}
:::


### Bio

Dr. Josiah Johnston is currently a Director of Data Science at Daikin Open Innovation Lab Silicon Valley.
